label: Description
value: The St John's Park food bank is provided in collaboration with Sheffield Food and Community Trust and Trussell.

label: Heading
value: Food Bank

label: Referral policy
value: The food bank is accessible by referral only, and provides an emergency parcel for those in food crisis.

label: Referrals heading
value: To request a referral for a food parcel call either:

label: Referrals 1
value: Help Through Hardship: 08082082138 Monday to Friday 9am - 5pm. Translators available.

label: Referrals 2
value: Citizens Advice Sheffield: 08082787820 Monday to Friday 10am - 4pm. Select option 4 for Advice Line.

label: Referrals 3
value: Sheffield S6 helpline: 0114 321 0733 Monday to Friday 10am-1pm.

label: Support description
value: At the food bank, we offer support with more than just food; Citizens Advice and Debt Support workers are available during the food bank session for those with referrals.

label: Time
value: Every Monday 10am - 12pm

label: Volunteer html
value: If you are interested in volunteering at our food bank, please contact Hannah Graham for more information: hannah@saintjohnspark.org.
notes: HTML allowed. Keep links as text.

label: Where
value: St John's Park, Bernard Street, S2 5PU

label: Who
value: Anyone with a referral from a support worker or agency

label: Import calendar label
value: Import Calendar

label: Description
value: Join us every Monday for soup, bread, a hot drink, and a chat. All are welcome, and it is free.

label: Heading
value: Lunch Club

label: Time
value: Monday 11:40am-12:40pm

label: Button label
value: Join Zoom Meeting

label: Description
value: Monday to Friday at 8:00am for 30 minutes on Zoom.

label: Extra
value: We also meet in church on the first Sunday of each month from 10:00-10:30am before the service.

value: Midweek Online Prayers
